sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select v-model="modelValue">
        <option disabled value="">Select the option</option>
        <option 
        v-for="option in options" 
        :key="option.value" 
        :value="option.value">
        </option>
    </select>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'my-select',
    props:{
        modelValue:{
            type:String
        },
        options:{
            type:Array,
            default: () => []
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
</style>
